snippet: The prisoner, Noor Uthman Mohammed, has finished the portion of his sentence he was required to serve, the Pentagon announced.
abstract: Noor Uthman Mohammed, Sudanese man who in 2011 pleaded guilty to terrorism charges, will be released from Guantanamo Bay prison after serving his sentence; Mohammed's transfer had been in doubt due to restrictions on returning detainees to state sponsors of terror.
lead_paragraph: The prisoner, Noor Uthman Mohammed, has finished the portion of his sentence he was required to serve, the Pentagon announced.

headline.main: Sudanese Detainee to Be Sent Home From Guantánamo
headline.print_headline: Sudanese Man to Be Freed From Guantánamo
